Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.ViewStates

Class TitleScreenState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.ViewStates.ViewState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.ViewStates.TitleScreenState
public class TitleScreenState extends ViewState
Represents the title screen state of the client-side view. Extends ViewState.

      public void keyPressed()
